Package Listeners

Interface GameEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Game, ServerImpl
public interface GameEventListener
The interface that represents a listener of the events occurred in the model.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addGameEventListener(GameEventListener listener)
    Adds a listener to the list of GameEventListener.
    void
    gameStateChanged()
    Notifies the listeners the changing of the state of the game.
    void
    notifyEndGame()
    Notifies the listeners the beginning of the last turn of the match.
    void
    notifyForcedTurnEnding()
    Notifies the listeners the end of the current player's turn due to the crash of the player
    void
    notifyGameFinished()
    Notifies the listeners the end of the match.
    void
    notifyLastError()
    Notifies the listeners the last error occurred to the match.
    void
    notifySkipTurn()
    Notifies the listeners the skip of the turn because the player is disconnected.
    void
    readyToStart()
    Notifies the listeners the start of the first player's turn.
    void
    turnIsOver()
    Notifies the listeners the transition to the next player during the game.

  • Method Details

    • addGameEventListener

      void addGameEventListener(GameEventListener listener)
      Adds a listener to the list of GameEventListener.
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener to add.

    • gameStateChanged

      void gameStateChanged() throws RemoteException
      Notifies the listeners the changing of the state of the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while executing the remote operation.

    • turnIsOver

      void turnIsOver() throws RemoteException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Notifies the listeners the transition to the next player during the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while executing the remote operation.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - If a player wants to select too much slots (according to the space in his shelf and the slot's configuration on the dashboard).
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - If the user selects not adjacent slots.
      NotCatchableException - If the user selects one (or more) not catchable slots.

    • readyToStart

      void readyToStart() throws RemoteException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Notifies the listeners the start of the first player's turn.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while executing the remote operation.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - If a player wants to select too much slots (according to the space in his shelf and the slot's configuration on the dashboard).
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - If the user selects not adjacent slots.
      NotCatchableException - If the user selects one (or more) not catchable slots.

    • notifyEndGame

      void notifyEndGame() throws RemoteException
      Notifies the listeners the beginning of the last turn of the match.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while executing the remote operation.

    • notifyGameFinished

      void notifyGameFinished() throws RemoteException
      Notifies the listeners the end of the match.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while executing the remote operation.

    • notifySkipTurn

      void notifySkipTurn() throws RemoteException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Notifies the listeners the skip of the turn because the player is disconnected.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while executing the remote operation.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - If a player wants to select too much slots (according to the space in his shelf and the slot's configuration on the dashboard).
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - If the user selects not adjacent slots.
      NotCatchableException - If the user selects one (or more) not catchable slots.

    • notifyLastError

      void notifyLastError() throws RemoteException
      Notifies the listeners the last error occurred to the match.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while executing the remote operation.

    • notifyForcedTurnEnding

      void notifyForcedTurnEnding() throws NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, RemoteException
      Notifies the listeners the end of the current player's turn due to the crash of the player
      Throws:
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - If a player wants to select too much slots (according to the space in his shelf and the slot's configuration on the dashboard).
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while executing the remote operation.
